pages.title: Radiant Glass
pages.text: $(italic)You need a way to efficiently light your shelter and other structures.$(br2)What could be better than using the luminous properties of Shimmerstone directly in your glass?$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Radiant Glass is pretty much the opposite of Tinted Glass. The Shimmerstone used in its manufacture ensures that the glass glows from within.
